title: Native American Cultures and Traditions

vocab.definition: The first people to live in North America before Europeans arrived
A group of Native American people who share the same culture and language
The way of life, customs, and traditions of a group of people
Customs and beliefs passed down from one generation to the next
Land set aside by the government for Native American tribes

teachingNotes: Focus on respect for Native American cultures. Discuss different tribes and their ways of life. Emphasize that Native Americans are still an important part of America today.
